name: Fox009 Recent Comments Widget
author: Fox009

sections.description:
This plugin will provide custom and advanced recent comments widget.

Allows you to use avatar, time, title, etc. to display a list of the latest comments.

You can also choose whether to display the newer comments first or the older ones first.

If you liked the plugin, please rate it.

This plugin is maintained by Fox009, a WordPress resource site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload fox009-recent-comments-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate it through the Plugins menu in WordPress management page.
  3. Add the plugin’s widget on the Appearance\Widgets page.
  4. That’s it.

Does the plugin support localization?

Yes, please use translate.wordpress.org.

short_description: Provides custom recent comment widget with additional features such as display avatar, comment excerpt and more!
